phrases: It is no good if yer always lookin' up.
And take it once it hits the ground.
It is no good to always be looking up.
Move patiently... at my own pace.
If I practice calligraphy steadily, without cutting corners on my work,
then, in time, I may find my own style.
What kind of movie is this?
Tepid Tea Myopic Detective: Hot Springs Arc Movie: Demon Geezer 2
OR Health Comes First Extra: 250 Life Lessons Learned from Pandas
It was popular enough to get a sequel?
I doubt this island has a place that will fix computers.
It has not worked right since I dropped it in the ocean...
No computer, no cell phone, no landline...
How can I contact anyone from a place like this?!
A whole month has passed since I came to this island.
Contrary to the slow life I expected, my days are unexpectedly busy.
there is one place that always heals my heart.
This place is a paradise for cat lovers.
But this is someone else's property.
Damn things broke into the fridge again!
Landsakes, no need to get so mad.
Anyone'd be mad, if their sashimi dinner got eaten up!
Ah, so you like cats, too.
Well, come see'them anytime you like.
They are all strays that settled here before I realized.
Th-Then, I will not hold back.
I told ya, they are strays.
They do not come near people.
What am I supposed to do with my arms now?
those leftovers from lunch should be my dinner...
I just call'them that when I call'them.
Society would consider these pet cats, though.
Blackie's the one that is closest to people.
The other strays will not let you pet'them,
Then hold on tight with both hands!
Even a stray kitten is still cute.
I told ya to hold on tight!
Sensei, you got a rash on yer neck!
Sensei, think ya might be allergic to cats?
You should not approach animals carelessly.
You do not want to be itchy, do you?
If that happens, I cannot take the itching from you.
So I can never have a cat...
I never would have known if I had not touched one.
Oh, Sensei, you got a rash on your neck.
She went to the senior center.
You may shop if you like.
No, I just need to borrow the phone.
He is real good at video games!
Play For Just One Hour Each Day
Ya do not know Master Takahashi?
Is he a kyogen performer or something?
He is a master at video games.
I feel like I have seen him somewhere before...
Wow, you look so much like her!
Please, just hurry up and use the phone!
Yes, because it is a black telephone.
I have only seen these on television.
In an era of cell phones with cameras and touch-sensitive screens, why is this here?
I will be playing a game, so help yourself to the phone.
I am about to make an important phone call, so be quiet.
Nothing happens when I press it.
You do not press on it.
This black phone is just stiff and hard to turn!
You can take yer finger out now.
It will not work unless you pick up the receiver before dialing.
Just tell me the number you want to call.
I will dial it for you.
If you pity me, give me money!
Be quiet, I am on the phone!
My computer broke, so I need to get a new one.
I cannot get work without it.
I would like you to take a break from work for a while.
Autumn's the deadline for the Naruka Institute Exhibition.
This is no time for you to be working.
As your friend, I thought I should look out for you.
Well, we can let it go this time if you do not feel up to it,
Order the writing equipment I am about to describe.
Can I expect you to get the grand prize this time?
Right now I am in total darkness,
but I will definitely find the light, someday.
So, what is the cost per minute?
Right now I am in total darkness...
But I will definitely find the light.
Was what I said that bad?
In eighth grade, you claimed to harbor some power in your left arm, did not you?
I talked for about five minutes, so will fifty yen be enough?
The phone costs ten yen per call.
Gramma says to use it for free,
And this comes to forty yen.
I made a nice, fat balloon!
Do not touch it with your dirty hand!
What the heck did you do?!
I would assumed that a calligrapher would be more stuffy.
I never would have known the truth if I had not met you.
You are an odd person, like they say.
Can I come to visit sometime?
You mean I will have both siblings coming to trash my house?
None of this is good enough!
Maybe it is because I stopped working to focus on the exhibition.
Writing even a single sheet feels like a huge undertaking.
If I cannot improve my mood and write something, the deadline
What are you tryin' to do?!
Ya spilled all the seaweed I worked hard to collect!
Ya expect to get off the hook with an excuse like that?
Are not seen your face before...
I heard yer an odd person, but a bad apple?!
Yer going to do me a little favor, Sensei...
Caught by a Grade-A annoying old guy!
Yer outta luck, gettin' caught up with my dad.
he exclaimed, I will have him write my boat's name!
He looks like he would never forgive any failure.
Dad is mighty scary when he is mad.
Will the boat's name be Miwa-maru, as the custom goes?
He just bought the boat for fun.
I are not going to give it my name.
Boat Name: Yuigadokuson-Maru (I Alone Am Holy)
I am so glad Mom picked my name.
It means that I am God, of course!
And with the curves of the hull, it will be hard to keep them balanced.
These are not my usual tools, either.
Even discounting the pressure he is putting on me,
I definitely cannot afford to mess this up!
The paint's going to melt yer hands.
I need to make a draft,
so I will go write it at home and come back.
First, I will cut out the letters that I wrote,
then I will paint over the stencil...
That is like all those other cookie-cutter boats!
I want my boat to be one-of-a-kind!
Sure, but these are not my usual writing tools,
and it is on something other than paper.
If you want it done right, you should ask a specialist...
What, yer tellin' me to head out t'sea in some ugly mass-produced boat?!
But if I mess up, it will be ugly anyway.
So, yer going to mess up, Sensei?
But I cannot rule anything out...
Can a pro really be turnin' down work?
I will decide what is ugly!
If I wanted to sail this out with print-out writin' on it,
I would have Naru do the job!
I have... sailed in to the rescue!
Dad, it is time for yer liquor deliveries.
What d'you mean, whip something up?!
A liquor seller's got to sell liquor!
What do you mean, like I always do?!
That damn gangster dad's got me cornered!
Still, I am not one to back away from anything after being talked to like that!
I will have him thanking me in tears!
That said, I really need to get used to this kind of brush.
The paint will not come off!
Relax, it will not melt your hands.
More importantly, is there anything I can use for test writing?
There is lots of boards up here!
This is more than enough for test writing.
It is easier than I expected.
I am mostly used to this brush now.
My inner voice is really revealing itself, though...
Somehow, I have a feeling I can write decent calligraphy.
Wait, I forgot to consider the curvature of the hull!
I am glad, but my neck hurts!
I forgot to examine the hull!
I nearly messed up, damn it!
All right, this area looks good...
I did all that test writing!
Faced with this pure white boat, I am too scared to move the brush.
Will not I mess it up?
Ya better hurry before Miwa-nee gets back!
I am scared... I am scared... I am scared...
I have been under pressure before.
It took a while before I could write something good,
but I still pulled through when I had to.
I will do it just like then...
What are you doing, you brats?!
Well, you were sayin' you hated it.
That is not what I meant!
I have to cover up the handprints.
I need to use strokes this bold to cover up the handprints!
Hina, stay back so your clothes do not get dirty!
Kenta, put paper beneath wherever the ink's about to drip!
I was so scared just a moment ago,
and the brush is moving easily.
Just because of these little handprints...
He is having a lot of fun, huh?
Village Chief said he is a guy who laughs while workin',
an' it looks to be true.
Here, take this seaweed as thanks.
Wait, is not this the seaweed I just picked up?
Well, you did a great job.
I will call when it is launchin' time, so you better come see!
I did not expect you to be this happy with it.
I am mighty glad I asked you, Sensei.
It is more my boat than I ever imagined!
It was difficult to write calligraphy on a boat,
Once I thought of it as soiling white paper,
that made it easy to do.
You have amassed quite a lot of resentment toward me, have not ya?
Those boards're meant for ferrying passengers.
What are you going to do'bout this?!
There is a lot of trash around here.
Yeah, guys who come to fish here just toss stuff away.
They do not heed warnings, either.
Why do not you try putting up a well-phrased billboard?
Because of your littering, the world is coming to an end.
Do not toss out trash, you are trash.
That will rub them the wrong way.
Litter here, and you will fester where the sun does not shine.
If you litter, all the crayfish will go away.
